EmailTemplate.description: Email for recipients of new member numbers 1.25.2012
EmailTemplate.name: Duplicate member number alert
EmailTemplate.subject: Important IAVA information for you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
I am writing today to let you know that IAVA had to reissue a series of member numbers. Your membership number is one that has been affected and I wanted to quickly inform you of your new member number:
Your new member number is {!Contact.Membership_ID__c}.
As a reminder, your member number allows you to access the Rucksack. If you are not familiar the Rucksack is where you can find exclusive deals and giveaways for Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans.
If you have any questions please email the membership team at membership@iava.org.
Thanks, Jason
Jason Hansman Membership Director Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America (IAVA) 292 Madison Avenue, 10th Floor New York, NY 10017 (212) 982-9699 www.iava.org Follow us on Twitter: @IAVA
